bio: I build services from the ground up, developing robust backends and designing elegant and responsive UI/UX interfaces. I build solutions for clinical trial studies at
wip-text: This web app is under work in progress as I work on it mostly during weekends. You can track the project progress at
about-text: Hello! My name is Gourav and I love building software that solves real world problems. Engineering has been a passion of mine since childhood, and I've made my way into the field of software engineering.
I am based out of Ranchi, Jharkhand, India and have pursued my Graduation from
My main focus these days is building solutions for clinical trial studies at

Outside of my professional commitments, I engage in web application development to both refine my technical skills and stay updated with emerging technologies in the industry. Additionally, I participate in hackathons, earning recognition and prizes for my contributions. More recently, I have also begun contributing to open source projects.

experience.name: Faeth
paras: Built GraphQL APIs and screens for various features such as patient surveys and food deliveries, enabling efficient data collection and analysis for personalized treatment using ReactJS, NodeJS with TypeScript, and AWS cloud.

Building a data platform to perform ETL and generate tables, listings, and figures (TLFs) to produce clinical study reports (CSRs), processing over billions of rows in support of clinical trials using AWS Glue, Athena & Terraform.

experience.name: Swym
paras: Currently contributing to the development of scalable integration abstraction platform, empowering developers to seamlessly integrate third-party platform solutions resulting in enhanced customer retention.
Played a pivotal role in enhancing our app's integration base by seamlessly integrating external platforms such as Gorgias CRM and Yotpo offering merchants an enriched e-commerce experience.
Contributed to the development of various Shopify apps, enhancing e-commerce for shoppers and merchants by reducing shopper friction.
Tasked with the responsibility of ensuring the smooth migration of data across different tiers and overseeing the efficient import of customer data into our systems.
Designed and implemented a customized tool automating the customer data import process, resulting in a substantial boost to the productivity of the customer support team.

projects.title: Buyz Ecommerce Platform
projects.content: A web-based e-commerce marketplace platform that allows vendors to sell their products and buyers to purchase products. It's built with Node JS + TypeScript for the backend and React JS for the frontend, providing a seamless and user-friendly e-commerce experience.

projects.title: Dot Portfolio
projects.content: A dark & light themed responsive portfolio website built with ReactJS and styled using Tailwind CSS. The project is designed to be highly customizable, by using the profile.json file, which allows to personalize various profile aspects of the portfolio, such as name, domain, bio, and more. It's built keeping in mind the SEO and web accessibility standards.
